Funders & Facilities

ORCID is a free, unique, persistent identifier (PID) for individuals to use as they engage in research, scholarship, and innovation activities. Learn how ORCID can help you spend more time conducting your research and less time managing it.

Uniquely Yours

Distinguish yourself and claim credit for your work no matter how many people have your same (or similar) name.

Sign Up

Connect your record

Allow trusted organizations to add your research information to your ORCID record and spend less time managing it!

Learn more

Portable profile data

Easily share data between your record and funding, publications, data repositories, and other research workflows.

Learn more

ORCID allows universities and research institutions to stay up to date with their researchers’ outputs, reduce administrative burden and input errors, and helps their researchers, post-docs, employees, and students improve the discoverability of their works.

Save time, reduce errors

Save everyone time and reduce input errors by allowing them to pre-populate forms with data from an ORCID record.

Learn more

Support research productivity

Let your researchers spend more time on their research by reducing administrative burden

Learn more

Track Careers

Track researchers’ and graduates’ careers after they leave your institution as well as collaborators and peers at other institutions.

Learn more

Publishers that integrate with ORCID can streamline workflows for authors, editors, and reviewers alike. ORCID improves the overall value of books and journals to the community, helping ensure that publishers have greater retention of authors and readers.

Know your authors

 better know who your authors, co-authors, and reviewers are and improve the integrity of your submission, review, and reporting processes.

Learn more

Improve discoverability

Help your authors improve their visibility and improve the discoverability of their works and contributions by the scholarly community.

Learn more

Solve data discrepancies

Solve metadata and name discrepancies between different datasets

Learn more

Vendors and service providers that connect their services to the ORCID Registry join our ecosystem of over 5,000 ORCID-integrated systems. Providing this service increases the value they provide to the scholarly community with authoritative, high-quality profile data.

Increase ROI

Increase the ROI of your platform and create better insights for the organizations you work with.

Learn more

Reduce burden

Save everyone time and reduce input errors when filling out forms, such as grant applications, or manuscript submissions.

Learn more

 Improve discoverability

Add links from ORCID records to improve the visibility and discoverability of your service.

Learn more

ORCID helps governments and policy makers elevate the integrity of their region’s research with trustworthy data, which serves to better align research and national PID and infrastructure strategies with global community standards.

Know your researchers

Better know who your researchers are and improve the integrity of your assessment and reporting processes.

Learn more

Align research strategy

Better align your research, PID, or infrastructure strategy with global community standards

Learn more

Improve data interoperability

Help your researchers improve the discoverability and interoperability of their contributions

Learn more

ORCID integrated systems reduce administrative burden for research funding agencies and major facilities that award access to resources. With less time and effort spent administering awards, they can better measure the impact of their awards.

Know your researchers

Better know who your applicants and reviewers are and improve the integrity of your submission, review, and reporting processes

Learn more

Track your impact

Improve your ability to track the impact of your awards and your awardees, even beyond the period of performance.

Learn more

Improve discoverability

Help your awardees improve their visibility, and improve the discoverability of their works and contributions, by the scholarly community.

Learn more
  • Get your ORCID iD and record
  • Troubleshoot my record
  • Discover our member benefits
  • Adopt ORCID at my institution
  • Get data from ORCID
  • Add institutional data to ORCID
